snippet.title: Mental Omega - The Finale Official Trailer  //  C&C Red Alert 2
snippet.description:
His plan is now nearly complete. Celebrate the 20th Anniversary of Yuri's Revenge by witnessing the end of Yuri's path to world domination, his almost perfect revenge, in Mental Omega 3.3.6.
● Download Now - http://mentalomega.com   ● Twitter - http://twitter.com/speeder_mo 
● Facebook - https://facebook.com/MentalOmegaAPYR
● Discord - https://discord.com/invite/KpJzhWY
● ModDB - http://moddb.com/mods/mental-omega

"1982. Hungering for revenge, the Soviets launch a full-scale invasion against the United States of America. The Allied primary defense network is shut down under mysterious circumstances and the only thing between the Soviets and America is a tiny little ocean. The third Great World War begins, where the strings are pulled by a single man - a remnant of Stalin's psychic legacy."

Enhanced with the powerful Ares DLL, a project headed by AlexB to push Red Alert 2 Yuri's Revenge engine to its limits, Mental Omega mod created by the Mentalmeisters introduces an entirely new faction to the play: the powerful and technologically advanced Foehn Revolt, as well as continues to bring new features to Command & Conquer: Red Alert 2 Yuri’s Revenge, the classic RTS by Westwood Studios, while maintaining a strong sense of gameplay balance. 

Music: "From Chaos" by World Beyond - Visit his channel for more music: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRwQT10OBSzcJSOlvLHPvTA

#RTS #CommandAndConquer #RedAlert2 #MentalOmega
Red Alert 2 Mods / Yuri's Revenge Mods / Command & Conquer Mods
